actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against income tax to defense contractors for expenses of retraining their employees.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow certain defense contractors a credit for expenses of retraining of employees. Expresses the sense of the Congress that any reduction in revenues by reason of such credit be offset by a reduction in defense spending.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a credit against income tax to defense contractors for expenses of retraining their employees.
